locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Baby Coloring Word HD
locale.subtitle: Beautiful color world
locale.description: This is an out of the ordinary color painting software in the Pad! The children can choose a brush, a sum of a painting or paint, just like the real color paper playing games like painting. The game has an exquisite design, each of which will not go beyond its own fast color area, so the children can freely color some area with a brush without smear other places. It provides an interesting and practical painting tool for children to create their own wonderful paintings, give full play to their children's imagination and creativity, and feel the pleasure of painting and color. The features of our products: Color is easy to follow: easy to operate, easy to use and easy to adjust. Arbitrary free painting: in the world of lines and colors, the imagination is full of imagination. Preserve paintings: preserve children's creative achievements. Rich line draft: more than 100 kinds of beautiful pictures, such as animals, plants, transportation, aircraft trucks, etc. Custom color: simple and easy-to-use color selection, providing endless colors. Unique color sucker: choose the desired color directly in the picture again, convenient and fast. Automatic recognition of boundaries: let the children in the pattern painted not transcendence.
locale.promotional_text: Welcome to the wonderful world of children painting

keywords.keyword: 宇宙世界2岁宝宝画画免费,蜡笔小新星幼儿英语,未来教育等考,变形金刚侠,故事飞船,木偶游戏2-3,机器恐龙机器人梦工厂,新世界,儿童涂色书,小新打印,拼图,填色,逃脱,合成器,涂鸦,外星人,魔力小孩

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 宝宝涂色世界HD-绘画启蒙之涂鸦天地
locale.subtitle: 美好的涂色世界
locale.description: 这是一个平板上与众不同的涂色绘画软件！孩子们可以选择画笔，一笔一笔涂色或者作画，就像在真的涂色纸上玩涂色游戏一样。游戏有精妙的设计，每一笔都不会超出自己的色快区域，所以孩子们可以任意地给某个区域用画笔着色而不会涂脏别的地方。为孩子们提供一个有趣实用的涂色绘画工具，让他们创作出属于自己的美妙绝伦的绘画作品，充分发挥孩子们的想象力和创造力，感受绘画及色彩的乐趣。 我们产品的特点： 色彩随心涂：简易操作，宝宝轻松上手，笔刷大小可以任意调整。 任意自由画 ：在线条和色彩的世界天马行空，尽情挥洒想象力。 保存绘画作品：保留孩子们的创作成果。 丰富的线稿：100多种精美的图片,比如动物，植物，交通工具，飞机卡车等。 自定义颜色：简洁易用的颜色选择，提供无穷色彩。 独特颜色吸管：直接再画作中选取想要的颜色，方便又快捷。 自动识别边界：让孩子们在图案上涂色不会超出界。
locale.promotional_text: 欢迎孩子们来美妙绝伦的涂色世界

keywords.keyword: 爱宝宝涂色游戏,儿童涂鸦,炫彩霓虹,本,图色,涂颜色,世界,v2智能,免费,书,家长版,花园,添,画画,秀秀美,宝,恶魔,画板,王国,毁,丑,玫瑰,花园,战争,惠,花,沙,盒,汇,绘,织,图
